known_issues: Logo is missing/removed in the current deployed version and needs to be re-added
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Square black wordmark logo on transparent background (ml-enterprise-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Square black wordmark logo on transparent background (ml-enterprise-logo.dim_128x128.png)
- Simplified black logo mark favicon (ml-enterprise-favicon.dim_32x32.png)

existing_features.title: Add the uploaded logo image (LOGO-2.jpeg) to the frontend as optimized static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated, ensuring the files exist at the exact paths already referenced by the app.

new_feature_requests.summary: Re-add the logo to the deployed build (restore prior logo placement/asset)
Ensure the site header and footer display the logo image using the existing references to /assets/generated/ml-enterprise-logo.dim_512x512.png.
Ensure the favicon loads correctly using the existing references in frontend/index.html to /assets/generated/ml-enterprise-favicon.dim_32x32.png.

projectName: Re-add ML Enterprise logo assets and restore header/footer + favicon branding
